sentence: Mark Finchem, an Arizona state House member, said in a press release the following week that he was there "to deliver an evidence book and letter to Vice President Pence showing key evidence of fraud in the Arizona Presidential Election, and asking him to consider postponing the award of electors" Doug Mastriano, a Pennsylvania state senator, publicly called for the Republican-controlled legislature in his state to appoint its own electors to change the outcome of the presidential election there because of "mounting evidence that the PA presidential election was compromised."
author: Zak Hudak
title: January 6 committee subpoenas others tied to false elector scheme
